heading: HB09204
0: AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY AS THE INDEPENDENT ECONOMIC AND PLANNING AGENCY OF THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT, DEFINING ITS FUNCTIONS, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, REPEALING FOR THE PURPOSE EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 230 SERIES OF 1987, ALSO KNOWN AS THE REORGANIZATION ACT OF THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY
short-title: Institutionalizing The National Economic And Development Authority As The Independent Economic And Planning Agency Of The Philippine Government, Defining Its Functions
principal-authors: MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA; SALCEDA, JOEY SARTE; YAP, ARTHUR C.; GATCHALIAN, WES; GARCIA, GWENDOLYN F.; GARIN, SHARON S.; YAP, VICTOR A.; ZUBIRI, MANUEL F.; GARCIA, JOSE ENRIQUE III S.; LIMKAICHONG, JOCELYN SY; SALON, ORESTES T.; TING, RANDOLPH S.; GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR. D.;
status: Approved by the House on 2019-06-03, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-06-04 and received by the Senate on 2019-06-04
